issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description:
Currently, the memory benchmark is implemented just for x86 (memory_benchmark.cc).

The task is to add the memory benchmark for Arm64.
fields.summary: [C++] Add Arrow memory benchmark for Arm64
